TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ResourceWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceWriter
Public NotInheritable Class ResourceWriter Implements IResourceWriter
public ref class ResourceWriter sealed : System::Resources::IResourceWriter
type ResourceWriter = class interface IResourceWriter interface IDisposable

summary.span: 以系统默认的格式将资源写入输出文件或输出流。

span.span: Writes resources in the system-default format to an output file or an output stream.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的默认实现接口。 provides a default implementation of the interface. 它可以以编程方式创建二进制资源 (.resources) 文件。It enables you to programmatically create a binary resource (.resources) file. 为使用的名称和值对指定资源方法。Resources are specified as name and value pairs using the method. 资源名称区分大小写时用于查找，但更轻松地支持创作工具和帮助消除 bug，将不允许具有仅大小写的名称的.resources 文件。Resource names are case-sensitive when used for lookups, but to more easily support authoring tools and help eliminate bugs, will not allow a .resources file to have names that vary only by case. 类，可创建字符串、 对象和二进制资源。The class enables you to create string, object, and binary resources. 二进制资源可以写入资源文件作为字节数组或流。Binary resources can be written to the resource file as a byte array or a stream. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 若要创建的资源文件，创建唯一的文件名，以及调用至少一次，调用以将资源文件写入到磁盘，然后调用关闭此文件。To create a resources file, create a with a unique file name, call at least once, call to write the resources file to disk, and then call to close the file. 调用将隐式调用如果不显式调用。Calling will implicitly call if you do not explicitly call . 不会按相同顺序添加一定是写入资源。The resources will not necessarily be written in the same order they were added. 若要从创建的二进制.resources 文件中检索资源类，可以使用类，该类允许您检索已命名的资源，或类，该类允许您枚举文件中的所有资源。To retrieve resources from a binary .resources file created by the class, you can use the class, which lets you retrieve named resources, or the class, which lets you enumerate all the resources in the file. ## Examples 下面的示例将多个字符串写入到 myResources.resources 文件。The following example writes several strings into the myResources.resources file. [!code-cpp[Classic ResourceWriter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ResourceWriter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ResourceWriter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ResourceWriter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ResourceWriter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ResourceWriter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value` 必须可序列化。`value` must be serializable. 不会将资源写直到调用方法。The resource is not written until the method is called. 可以检索由编写的资源方法通过调用方法。You can retrieve the resources written by the method by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将对象数据添加到二进制资源文件。The following example uses the method to add object data to a binary resources file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcewriter.addresource/cs/addresource_obj1.cs#1)] `DonorColumns` 是一个自定义类，其字段包含要在用户界面中显示列的名称。`DonorColumns` is a custom class whose fields contain the names of columns to be displayed in the user interface. 请注意，此类标记与属性。Note that the class is marked with the attribute. 通常，类将定义在单独的程序集，并对它的引用会在编译时提供给编译器。Ordinarily, the class would be defined in a separate assembly, and a reference to it would be provided to the compiler at compile time.

member this.AddResourceData : string * string * byte[] -> unit

param.name: name
param.span: 标识包含所添加数据的资源的名称。

span.span: A name that identifies the resource that contains the added data.

param.name: typeName
param.span: 添加的数据的类型名称。

span.span: The type name of the added data.

param.name: serializedData
param.span: 一个字节数组，该数组包含添加的数据的二进制表示形式。

span.span: A byte array that contains the binary representation of the added data.

summary.span: 将数据单元作为资源添加到要写入的资源的列表。

span.span: Adds a unit of data as a resource to the list of resources to be written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以二进制形式添加资源 (即，作为一个字节数组) 到要写入的资源的列表。Use the method to add a resource in binary form (that is, as an array of bytes) to the list of resources to be written. 必须指定资源的资源和数据本身的二进制表示形式中包含的数据类型名称的名称。You must specify the name of the resource, the type name of the data contained in the resource, and the binary representation of the data itself. 添加所需的每个资源后，使用中指定了方法的资源的列表写入资源文件或流的构造函数。After you have added each resource you require, use the method to write the list of resources to the resources file or stream that was specified in the constructor. `typeName` 是一个字符串，表示资源的数据类型。`typeName` is a string that represents the data type of the resource. 它可以是以下值之一：It can be any of the following values: - 字符串表示形式`ResourceTypeCode`指示资源的数据类型的枚举成员。The string representation of a `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration member that indicates the data type of the resource. `ResourceTypeCode` 是可供用于指示特殊的二进制格式用于存储 19 常见数据类型之一的专用枚举。`ResourceTypeCode` is a private enumeration that is used by to indicate that a special binary format is used to store one of 19 common data types. 其中包括.NET Framework 基元数据类型 (， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， )，以及， ，并。These include the .NET Framework primitive data types (, , , , , , , , , , , , ), as well as , , and . 此外，`ResourceTypeCode`枚举包括下表中显示的值。In addition, the `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration includes the values shown in the following table. |`ResourceTypeCode` 值`ResourceTypeCode` value|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| |`ResourceTypeCode.ByteArray`|数据是一个字节数组。The data is a byte array.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Null`|数据为 null 引用。The data is a null reference.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Stream`|数据存储在流中。The data is stored in a stream.| - 一个字符串，包含其二进制数据分配到的类型的完全限定的名称`serializedData`自变量 (例如， `System.String`)。A string that contains the fully qualified name of the type whose binary data is assigned to the `serializedData` argument (for example, `System.String`). 此外，对于不属于.NET Framework 类库的类型，该字符串包括名称、 版本、 区域性和公钥的包含类型的程序集。In addition, for types that are not part of the .NET Framework class library, the string includes the name, version, culture, and public key of the assembly that contains the type. 例如，以下字符串指示序列化的数据表示的实例`Person`中键入`Extensions`命名空间，在名为具有任何公钥和不指定的区域性的实用工具程序集的版本 1.0 中找到。For example, the following string indicates that the serialized data represents an instance of the `Person` type in the `Extensions` namespace, which is found in version 1.0 of an assembly named Utility that has no public key and no designated culture. `Extensions.Person, Utility, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null` 用于读取与写入的资源数据并行方法方法是。A parallel method for reading resource data written with the method is . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来写入两个整数值到.resources 文件，然后使用要检索这些对象。The following example uses the method to write two integer values to a .resources file, and then uses a object to retrieve them. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResourceData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcewriter.addresourcedata/cs/addresourcedata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.AddResourceData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcewriter.addresourcedata/vb/addresourcedata.vb#1)]

summary.span: 允许用户关闭资源文件或流，从而显式地释放资源。

span.span: Allows users to close the resource file or stream, explicitly releasing resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的实现是相同。The implementation of this method is the same as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来写入所有资源中的对象到输出流的类。The following code example uses the method to write all resource objects in a class to the output stream. 然后，代码会关闭编写器，并使编写器的资源可供其他进程。The code then shuts down the writer and make the writer's resources available for other processes. summary.span: 将所有资源以系统默认格式保存到输出流。

span.span: Saves all resources to the output stream in the system default format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隐式调用方法如果它不由应用程序代码调用的方法。The method is called implicitly by the method if it is not called by your application code. 可以只调用一次之后所有调用的,和所做的。 can only be called once, after all calls to and have been made. 如果写入资源时出现异常，将关闭输出流，以防止编写无效的信息。If an exception occurs while writing the resources, the output stream will be closed to prevent writing invalid information. 不会关闭在正常情况下的输出流。 does not close the output stream in normal cases. 除非您将额外的数据组合使用.resources 文件或需要访问的流之后，应调用后调用，或只需调用。Unless you are combining extra data with your .resources file or need access to the stream afterwards, you should call after calling , or simply call . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来写入所有资源中的对象到输出流的类The following code example uses the method to write all resource objects in a class to the output stream [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example/CPP/resourcewritergenerate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example/CS/resourcewritergenerate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceWriter.Generate Example/VB/resourcewritergenerate.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个委托，通过该委托，可以使用限定的程序集名称以 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 之前的 .NET Framework 目标版本编写资源程序集。

span.span: Gets or sets a delegate that enables resource assemblies to be written that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] by using qualified assembly names.
The type that is encapsulated by the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 和 MSBuild 设置此属性，如果面向.NET Framework 的早期版本。 and MSBuild set this property if you target an earlier version of the .NET Framework.
